member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_CONTROL_FLOW_GUARD_POLICY
member.summary: Contains process mitigation policy settings for Control Flow Guard (CFG). The and functions use this structure.

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_CONTROL_FLOW_GUARD_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Flags
member.summary: This member is reserved for system use.

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_CONTROL_FLOW_GUARD_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.EnableControlFlowGuard
member.summary: CFG is enabled for the process if this flag is set. This field cannot be changed via .

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_CONTROL_FLOW_GUARD_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.EnableExportSuppression
member.summary: If TRUE, exported functions will be treated as invalid indirect call targets by default. Exported functions only become valid indirect call targets if they are dynamically resolved via . This field cannot be changed via .

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_CONTROL_FLOW_GUARD_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.StrictMode
member.summary: If TRUE, all DLLs that are loaded must enable CFG. If a DLL does not enable CFG then the image will fail to load. This policy can be enabled after a process has started by calling . It cannot be disabled once enabled.

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_CONTROL_FLOW_GUARD_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.ReservedFlags
member.summary: This member is reserved for system use.
